podcasts.title: Introducing mArvIn: Our New AI-Powered Assistant
podcasts.description:
Meet the latest addition to our services ‚Äì mArvIn, the newest member of our digital team!

Unlike typical chatbots, mArvIn engages with your data, providing tailored responses that understand context and follow conversation threads effortlessly. Plus, with enterprise-grade security, your data is always protected!

Once we establish the foundation of contextual conversation with LLM, we can take it further with:

üîä Speech to Text: Talk to mArvIn through your computer or phone‚Äôs microphone.

üó£Ô∏è Text to Speech: mArvIn reads its answers aloud, perfect for hands-free use or dictation.

üåê Multi-Lingual: mArvIn translates content on demand, acting as a convenient translator.

Check out mArvIn and see how it can help you understand our business better!

Learn more about mArvIn here: https://bit.ly/3QNLlZa

podcasts.title: Let's Find Playgrounds Near You!
podcasts.description:
Come with us to see the Find My Playground journey! ‚†Ä ‚†Ä 
 
Find My Playground was created to help families to find the right facilities for their little ones, and for the community to review and list playground features that might be important for families, especially the accessibility features of each playground. 
 
You can find the list of the inclusive playground features for each playground on the top list of our search engines, which not many sites or playground search engines do. ‚†Ä 
 
Let us help you to find more fun adventures near you! https://findmyplayground.com‚†Ä

podcasts.title: Marion Baillat: Bridging Digital Transformation in Japan | My ANZCCJ Journey
podcasts.description:
Excited to share of the episodes of the Australian and New Zealand Chamber of Commerce (ANZCCJ)'s interview series, "My ANZCCJ Journey." This series brings to light the experiences of its members, revealing their motivations for relocating to Japan and the impact the Chamber has had on their journeys.

We're especially proud to feature one of our own from 42 Interactive, Marion Baillat, our Digital Executive Producer and Project Director. Marion's role not only keeps her connected to Australia but also significantly contributes to expanding our services, assisting both Japanese and Australian companies in their digital transformation efforts in Japan. Dive into her inspiring story by watching the episode!

For more information about our services please check out our website and other social media channels!  https://bit.ly/3Iobn0b 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/42interactive/
